docs.snippet: The above Board met yesterday. The Committee of the Whole submitted their usual weekly report, which was of considerable length. The following is an abstract of all the principal points of interest and importance:

headline.main: THE CITY GOVERNMENT.; DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC CHARITIES AND CORRECTION. THE COST OF PAUPER CHILDREN ACCOUNTS WITH THE U.S. MARSHAL AND EX-WARDEN DALY. LOSSES BY THE QUARANTINE FIRES. INVENTORY OF THE QUARANTINE BUILDINGS DESTROYED. BOARD OF SUPERVISORS. COUNTY CLERK'S BILL THE NEW JAIL. THE POLICE COMMISSIONERS. MORE FILTHY HOUSES.

docs.lead_paragraph: The above Board met yesterday. The Committee of the Whole submitted their usual weekly report, which was of considerable length. The following is an abstract of all the principal points of interest and importance:
